billboard.title: Registration open from July 15th
billboard.description: Musical theater in a 12-week intensive format with a function at the end in a theater. Sessions will be divided into singing, acting and dancing and will be on Monday and Saturday mornings.

contact_form_label_subscription: I want to subscribe to the mailing list.
contact_form_label_privacy: I have read and accept the privacy policy
contact_form_title: Leave us a request and get more information
cookies_banner_link_more: I want to Know more about cookies in this site
cookies_banner_sentence2: This site uses cookies to improve the user experience. Please tell us if you accept all cookies for that purpose.

slide_1.title: Musical theater courses for all ages
slide_1.description: Groups for children from 7 years and young people from 14

slide_2.title: The bilingual academy for young talents
slide_2.description: All teachers are bilingual and speak English during their classes

slide_3.title: Intensive courses with a performance in the theater
slide_3.description: All courses will feature in a theater for each end of term

address.title: Microteatre Barcelona
address.complementary: The face-to-face lessons and end-of-year performances will be inside the MicroTeatre de Barcelona, located in the center of the Gràcia district of Barcelona. In addition, the MicroTeatre has its own bar in case the students' companions want to wait there.

service_1.title: Courses for all ages
service_1.description: Groups from 7 years old and young people from 14 and up.

service_2.title: English classes
service_2.description: All teachers are bilingual and speak English during their lessons.

service_3.title: Performance in a real theatre
service_3.description: All courses will feature in a real theatre for each end of term.

teacher_1.name: Jofre Alsina
teacher_1.description: Jofre comes from Barcelona, where he gained a BA Hons. in Physical Theatre at the Spanish Institut del Teatre. In London he studied drama at Rose Bruford College where he further developed his skills with the piano and the double bass. He graduated in 2009 with a BA Hons in Actor-Musicianship.

teacher_2.name: Jofre Alsina
teacher_2.description: Jofre comes from Barcelona, where he gained a BA Hons. in Physical Theatre at the Spanish Institut del Teatre. In London he studied drama at Rose Bruford College where he further developed his skills with the piano and the double bass. He graduated in 2009 with a BA Hons in Actor-Musicianship.

title: Broadway BCN

meta.title: Broadway BCN l'academia de teatre musical per joves a Barcelona
meta.description: Accès per alumnes a partir dels 7 anys, totes les classes són amb un/a professora/a bilingüe i amb l'anglès com idioma base, tots els cursos intensius ténen funció final dins dun teatre.

what_we_do.title: Learn with us
what_we_do.theatre_description: Learn with us breathing techniques, position and the proper warm-up of your specific vocal cords to sing a musical theater show.
what_we_do.interpretation_description: Learn different acting techniques focused on musical theater.
what_we_do.dance_description: Learn different dance techniques focused on musical theater.
